+000006b0: 2a20 496e 6974 6961 6c6c 7920 6372 6561  * Initially crea

+00000700: 286e 616d 6573 2c20 7573 6572 6e61 6d65  (names, username
+00000710: 732c 2061 6e64 2070 6c61 696e 2074 6578  s, and plain tex

+00000730: 2061 6464 6974 696f 6e2c 2065 6e74 6572   addition, enter
